text:
The image shows
that there's a second drive, but doesn't show details for it. I suspect this is
a "small SSD drive, large data drive" scenario and the recovery partition is on
the second drive. -S
Link: None

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Feedback to Microsoft
